title: Item Sets were lost, plz explain?
body:
Made a hell load of Item sets last night. Saved them multiple times as I progressed through the list of 23. I didn't finish all 23 however none of them are there now. In their place are the 3 item sets I deleted last night before I started the new ones.
I played a game using one of the new sets before I logged off so they clearly saved in one form or another.\
And yes, I've tried re logging.
Any idea as to what happened here?
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
If you peak and see some there, that will be because I've started remaking them

replies.body:
Item sets are saved server-side, so any changes made should save automatically as long as you make those changes in the client. If for some reason your item sets were messed up by a hiccup between you and the servers, then your item sets may be super wonky. Unfortunately, we cannot revert any changes in the Item Sets system.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
